description: The Decozen Handmade Round Beaded Placemats will enhance the beauty of your coffee table or dining table. DECOZEN beaded placemats chargers are hand beaded, true craftsmanship needlework, intricately handcrafted and have distinctive designs using beads to create a concerto of textures and colors by artisans. The handmade table place mat adds an accent flair to any table at your farmhouse, home, living room, dining room, kitchen, garden, etc. This Handicraft table place mats is ideal for all wedding, holidays, caterings, dinners, brunches, family gatherings, everyday use, special occasions. They are handmade from high-quality materials. You can pick from different colored table mats to create a uniform or a contrast table look. It is not only ideal for dining or coffee tables, but they can also be placed on your sideboard or bedside table. These Elegant Round Placemats come in a set of 4. These table mats will help you maintain cleanliness on the table and give an amazing dining experience. You can place them at your dining table as a center mat or under the flower pots/show pieces or at your bedside tables. They are multi-utility which may add grace to your home decor and protect your Table top from scratches. These heat-resistant placemats ensure the safety of your tables against the hot serve ware. They make a perfect addition to any restaurant, bar, bistro, or café. You just need to wipe them with a soft, damp cloth or sponge and allow them to dry naturally. Make sure you do not place hot pan or pot on the placemat, otherwise it may get damaged.
